snippet.title: Avarice - Official Launch Trailer | NEW HORROR GAME
snippet.description:
Download the game here: https://teamdarkmode.itch.io/avarice

Avarice is a first-person, narrative-driven horror game set in the 1900s, where you experience a broken man’s descent into mental hell.

You play as Edward Armitage, a renowned explorer, returning home from an expedition gone wrong. Throughout the game, you experience a gripping narrative going through the curious mind of a man and his interpretation of untold events. 

Will you uncover the truth?
